  • Arthur Turnkey Vol. 1 is by Toby Jones, Alex Horab, Madeline Queripel, Amanda Thomas. The first in a new all-ages adventure serial.

    This is a crisply-paced, cleverly drawn, and consistently funny comic... The smallest details [] add a level of quirk that's charming and amusing. The Comics Journal

    This strange world and [its] sheer inventiveness... all are either nicely done or brilliant. Optical Sloth

    The art is crisp and fun and displays a visibly practiced hand, showcasing an effective yet playful feel. The writing keeps a good pace while dropping jokes at just the right points, while establishing a subtle emotional framework.
    — Jordan Kamin, Clogged - A Comic Blog
